title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 59.3 - English proficiency requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 59.3 - English proficiency requirement

State Regulations

An applicant for licensure whose application is based upon
credit granted for the completion of courses of study in a country where

English is not the principal language spoken shall demonstrate proficiency in

English by passing an examination in English proficiency acceptable to the
department or by passing a licensing examination acceptable to the department
given in English. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
59.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
